text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali, ne sleduyte po stopam satany! Kto sleduyet po stopam satany... , to ved' on prikazyvayet gnusnost' i neodobryayemoye. I yesli by ne shchedrost' Allakha k vam i ne Yego milost', ni odin by iz vas nikogda ne ochistilsya. No Allakh ochishchayet, kogo pozhelayet; Allakh - slyshashchiy, znayushchiy
